testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I launch random "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Instructor" and outcome URL "" and document target "window"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I click the 'New Class' mapping button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I am on a New Class page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I create new class with random name
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I click the 'Class Homepage' mapping button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Content Repository" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "Regrading test question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I choose "Maple-graded" link from the dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I change the Maple Graded answer to "x"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I set the Maple grading code to "with(Threads): Sleep(3); evalb(($ANSWER)-($RESPONSE)=0);"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I see the "Maple" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Default Unit" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "Regrading test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I click the import question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then The import questions dialog appears
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I click on "Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I select the question "Regrading test question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I click Import Questions in the Import Questions dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "Regrading test question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I start the "Regrading test" assignment in "Default Unit" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I enter "5" in Mathematical Formula input
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then my score 0 out of 1 (0 %) is shown in a grade report
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And quit and save the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I select "Regrading test - Homework/Quiz" in "Assignments" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I select "Other users with grades" in "List" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I select "Most Recent" in "Results" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I select "Completed" in "Progress" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I click the Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I click "Regrading test" in the Class Grades table
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I click "Q1" for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I see the grade details of question "Regrading test question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I click the Regrade Question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I am on the Regrading page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I verify the timestamps are in the correct format
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: And I see the regrading in progress spinner
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I dismiss the page leaving alert
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: When I click the Return Later button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: Then I see the grade details of question "Regrading test question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that prompt appears when attempting to leave page with regrading in progress
